afar.config.title: Afar Config
afar.config.option.enable.dic: Note that this mod §cdoes not§f work in single-player mode!
afar.config.option.render_distance.dic:
The loading distance of fake chunk.
You need to adjust the render distance in video settings to see the fake chunks
afar.config.option.max_fake_chunk_loadin: The maximum number of fake chunks loaded per tick
afar.config.option.max_fake_chunk_saving: The maximum number of fake chunks saved per tick
Trigger the threshold for the number of chunks committed in the database.
 a high threshold can lead to faster load speeds, but it also increases memory footprint
